about_the_game:
Hentai Femdom like you have never experienced before!

Femdom University 0 is the most merciless and unique Survial Game you will ever play.
Throughout the game, you play as a new student and are surrounded by dominant girls and teacher.
In order to survive, you have to try not to get seduced, manage your resources and keep up with your lessons!
You also have to pay rent by the end of each week, or there will be consequences!

DATE A DOMINANT WAIFU
Femdom like you want it. Interact with many kinds of different university girls.
They all have one thing in common: They want to dominate you! So better be careful!


PLAY AS A BOY OR A GIRL
Fully immerse yourself in this merciless world how you want it. Chose your character's gender.
Play as a shy and fearless boy or a bold and unstoppable girl, the choice is yours!


BEGGING
Are you desperate enough to get on your knees to beg for money or food?
Or do you want to keep your reputation as high as possible?


STORYMODE through 3 Games!
Your decisions will have consequences. This is the beginning of your story. And this is your story.
Your decisions, your consequences, Your save-file will stat here and transfer into
"FemUOne - Storymode" (release 2024) -> Which will contine all the way into FemU2-Storymode (release 2025).

content_descriptors.notes: Naked bodies of 35+ year old women. Censored(!)

name: Femdom University 0

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IDEO CARD: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IDEO CARD: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Femdom University 0 is an Open-World Survival-Dating-SimGame which is all about Femdom. You are a student in a university of dominant females where you have to take care of yourself and survive.
